content.rendered:
Real Stories from Happy Homeowners

★★★★★ 5/5

“We could not be happier with the product or the experience of working with them.”

From planning, scheduling, installing and activating the system, Chad and the team at CalPrem were timely, professional and thorough. We could not be happier with the product or the experience of working with them.

Michael W.

Customer

★★★★★ 5/5

“Working with California Premier Solar was a great experience.”

We took a long time to decide about getting the panels, and Chad was very patient and informative about our choices. The actual process of installation went very smoothly.

Phil and Jennifer G.

Customer

★★★★★ 5/5

“From the initial meeting to the final walk through, the customer service with California Premier Solar has been tremendous.”

I recently had California Premier Solar install solar on my roof. I was very impressed at the professional skill they exhibited in the installation—there is little to no electrical conduit showing. From the initial meeting to the final walk through, the customer service with California Premier Solar has been tremendous. Without reservation, I would recommend my friends use California Premier Solar.

Andrew D.

Customer

★★★★★ 5/5

“These guys are the best—hands down!”

Chad Young and his team at California Premier provided me with a total turnkey solar solution including all approvals by our homeowners association. Being an electrical engineer myself, I was seeking a quality, professional installation. These guys are the best—hands down!

Howard R.

Customer

★★★★★ 5/5

“Professional from the moment I called to get an estimate.”

The entire team at CPSC was very responsive and showed a refreshing level of attention to detail every step of the way! Very pleased

PJ Z.

Customer

★★★★★ 5/5

“Chad and his crew at California Premier Solar are top notch.”

Their team work approach and proactive communication was refreshing as they took time with us explaining each step of the process. From day one through the final inspection they kept to their projected timelines, and our budget.

Mike P.

Customer

★★★★★ 5/5

“Our installation came in on budget with a superior system and exceptional service that offsets all our electrical needs for many years to come.”

California Premier Solar was realistic and upfront about pricing and the confusing rebates (NHSP/T-24, state and federal rebates, etc…) which can be daunting. Other solar installers did show their net price being lower, but that’s only because unqualified rebates were included in their pricing. California Premier’s honesty and integrity was evident from beginning to end. Our installation came in on budget with a superior system and exceptional service that offsets all our electrical needs for many years to come.

John D.

Customer

★★★★★ 5/5

“Everyone from your roofers on through customer service was consistently demonstrating the high quality/skilled workmanship we were hoping for.”

We are extremely pleased with every part of our new solar installation. Your company was able to design and install a premium system within our limited budget and tight time constraints. Everyone from your roofers on through customer service was consistently demonstrating the high quality/skilled workmanship we were hoping for. It makes a big difference when you have people on your property that have that high level of concern and respect. Thank you again for really delivering as promised!

Dave Z.

Customer

★★★★★ 5/5

“They stand by their product 100%, and their system has allowed our annual electric bill to drop 94%.”

My experience with Rainbow Solar & Electric has been exceptional throughout. From the first phone call, throughout installation, and including follow up, they have been helpful, courteous and a pleasure to work with. They stand by their product 100%, and their system has allowed our annual electric bill to drop 94%. The process was on time and on budget, and they went the extra mile working with the city to avoid delays in activating the system. Additionally, they were gentle and comfortable with our fragile clay tile roof. We highly recommend them to all of our friends looking for clean energy.

Christy M.

Customer

★★★★★ 5/5

“Our electric bill reduction is even greater than we expected.”

We are completely satisfied with Rainbow Solar & Electric from the initial estimates to the final step of making power. Our electric bill reduction is even greater than we expected. I highly recommend them for your solar needs.

Gary L.

Customer

★★★★★ 5/5

“Working with Rainbow Solar & Electric could not have been easier.”

Their no-pressure sales approach and excellent customer service make them easy to recommend to family and friends. We’d definitely work with them again.

Josh R.

Customer

★★★★★ 5/5

“Working with Rainbow Solar & Electric was a real pleasure. They took care of everything from start to finish.”

Working with Rainbow Solar & Electric was a real pleasure. They took care of everything from start to finish.

Bill J.

Customer

★★★★★ 5/5

“Without doubt Rainbow Solar & Electric is one of the most professional and experienced residential solar companies in the business.”

Without doubt Rainbow Solar & Electric is one of the most professional and experienced residential solar companies in the business. Most importantly, Rainbow Solar & Electric is all about their CEO Chad Young. Chad is one of a kind: super responsive, never flustered, fair and reasonable in negotiating the upfront deal, willing to take time to explain the financial numbers, and leads a team that has an intimate knowledge of their job. I have recommended California Premier Solar to many of my neighbors in The Crosby knowing that Chad will absolutely take the best care of them!

Peter F.

Customer

★★★★★ 5/5

“I highly recommend Rainbow Solar & Electric to anyone interested in reducing their electric bills while reducing their carbon footprint and helping out the environment at the same time.”

I highly recommend Rainbow Solar & Electric to anyone interested in reducing their electric bills while reducing their carbon footprint and helping out the environment at the same time. From day one, Rainbow Solar & Electric explained all my options and helped me choose the right one for our family’s needs. The entire process was quick, easy and flawless. I’ve now had solar for just over a year and not only has my electricity bill been reduced to zero, but we also received money back from our utility company for the excess power generation we were able to send back to the grid.

Dominic D.

Customer

★★★★★ 5/5

“They are incredibly professional company with the best customer service. They truly provided a superior product at the highest level of service.”

After a lot of research, we chose California premier solar because of their incredible reputation, and they only continued to impress us. They are incredibly professional company with the best customer service. They truly provided a superior product at the highest level of service. They are the only company we would ever use.

Neda K.

Customer

Join Our Satisfied Customers
